I love siege, but you get to a point you're sick of all the gimmicks. 

CS is a straight up shooter where one moment you're sad, the next moment you feel like a god walking the earth.

Let's get back to our roots.  Stop the ults, stop the god like perks. Forget all the different "classes". Let's kill the old fashion way...
I liked the gameplay but the community is toxic.
Its fast, but got slow controls sometimes.

Although it was released in 2012, it is a game that can preserve its current and continuity - although not as much as the old one. It has successfully survived to 2021, especially with its map and graphic updates. The game hosts different emotions as in any online game. What angels do I know, he turned into Hulk when he started this game ...

The aim of the game is to make two groups of enemies (Terrorist and Anti-Terrorist) clash and have fun (!) In different modes. Except for the Competitive and Companion game modes, there is no ranked system that we like for online games. Elalem also falls into these two genres of play, which are generally ranked to show herself. Competitive and Comrade…

The game is very simply thought out, a game without P2W. Because it was simple, Valve didn't expect it to explode, I guess Valve didn't have the correct in-game trades at first. Valve also looked and thought that the game is very busy, we should put something in it. Ladies and gentlemen, here is the skin for weapons (although its Turkish equivalent is leather-skin, for CS: GO, we can translate it as "sticker for weapons") and (default - to get rid of the bread knife) knife! We cannot match this type of game at all. It's a very unnecessary plugin.
